sentences.en: "Do you like this colour, Victor?" she asked. "It is fine," said Vincent distantly.
sentences.cn: “维克托，你喜欢这颜色吗？”她问到。“不错，”文森特心不在焉地说。
莫丽?韦斯莱的他们极远的亲戚.

sentences.en: Distantly, to her right, she could make out the city of Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 在她的右侧, 她能远远地分辨出上海这座城市.

sentences.en: Distantly, to her right, she could make out the town of Chiffa.
sentences.cn: 在她右边，远远的，她依稀能辨认出希法镇。

sentences.en: Good fortune Phuchoa opens in other shore, I distantly in this shore.
sentences.cn: 幸福花开在彼岸, 我在此岸遥遥观望.
他冷冷地、淡漠地站起身来.

sentences.en: He claims to be distantly related to the British royal family.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己与英国王室是远亲.

sentences.en: He is distantly related to the family.
sentences.cn: 他与那个家族关系较远.

sentences.en: I looked at her distantly and didn't want to disturb her.
sentences.cn: 我远远地看着她,不想打扰她.

sentences.en: In any event she Behaved distantly to him now.
sentences.cn: 现在在任何事中她都对他态度冷淡.

sentences.en: Previous research which has looked at why certain groups of living mammals have bigger brains has relied on studies of distantly-related living mammals.
sentences.cn: 科学家先前在探寻为何特定的现存哺乳动物族群会拥有相对大的脑时，多借助于研究关系较为疏远的现存哺乳动物。

sentences.en: She became distantly aware that the light had grown brighter.
sentences.cn: 她隐约感觉到灯变得更亮了。

sentences.en: She is closely [ distantly ] related to me.
sentences.cn: 她和我有近 [ 远 ] 亲关系.
那人只是淡淡地笑了笑.

sentences.en: They are very distantly followed by India, Brazil and Russia.
sentences.cn: 远远跟在后面的，是印度、巴西和俄罗斯。

sentences.en: They were too distantly seated for any conversation.
sentences.cn: 他们坐得相隔太远，不便谈话。

sentences.en: Those two ideas are distantly related.
What these pictures demonstrate is that we do feel the pain of others, however distantly.
sentences.cn: 这些照片证实了 无论距离的远近 我们都可以感受到他人的痛楚。

trans.tran_cn: 远离地，冷淡地，关系较远地，恍惚地
